com.knowledgeplayers.grar.factory.UiFactory

type
class
Factory to create UI components

Static Methods

createButton(buttonType : String, tile : String, ?action : String) : com.knowledgeplayers.grar.display.component.button.DefaultButton

parameters
buttonType : Type of the button
tile : Tile containing the button icon
action : Event to dispatch when the button is clicked. No effects for DefaultButton type
returns
the created button
Create a button

createButtonFromXml(xml : haxe.xml.Fast) : com.knowledgeplayers.grar.display.component.button.DefaultButton

parameters
xml : fast xml node with infos
returns
the button
Create a button from XML infos

createScrollBar(width : Float, height : Float, ratio : Float, tileBackground : String, tileCursor : String) : com.knowledgeplayers.grar.display.component.ScrollBar

parameters
width : Width of the scrollbar
height : Height of the scrollbar
ratio : Ratio of the cursor
tileBackground : Tile containing background image
tileCursor : Tile containing cursor image
returns
the fresh new scrollbar
Create a scrollbar

setSpriteSheet(pathToXml : String) : Void

parameters
pathToXml : path to the XML file
Set the spritesheet file containing all the UI images

Constructor

new()
